title: RETRACTED: Qureshi et al. Synthesis and Evaluation of Anti-HIV Activity of Mono- and Di-Substituted Phosphonamidate Conjugates of Tenofovir. Molecules 2022, 27, 4447.
abstract: The journal retracts the article entitled "Synthesis and Evaluation of Anti-HIV Activity of Mono- and Di-Substituted Phosphonamidate Conjugates of Tenofovir" [...].
